long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Color Sentence, Read Easily!

This extension divides sentences into 5 parts,
then COLORIZE each part.
(Parts: 'Subject', 'Verb', 'Object', 'Component', 'Auxiliary'.)

You can turn on (and off) COLORIZATION by one click.


* Color Sentence works properly only for ENGLISH sentences.
* Color Sentence is still in its beta.
* Some element (links, images) could be invisible in Colorizaion mode,
but don't worry. They will be visible by turning it off at any time.
